name: places/ChIJjdEJeuxYwokRfVETeylN-ps
formattedAddress: 435 E 63rd St, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 435 E 63rd St, New York, NY 10065-7801, USA

originalText.text: Dr Eid is one of he finest doctors I’ve ever had the opportunity to meet and be treated by. From the consultation to the follow-ups after surgery, he has always been professional, amiable, understandable and patient. He always listens and I’ve never felt rushed or as if I was just another patient. I’m very happy with the results of the surgery and the treatment I’ve received. I’d be remiss if I didn’t mention that as great as Dr Eid is, his staff is as equally professional, warm, friendly and discrete. I highly recommend Dr. Eid and his office.

originalText.text:
My experience and initial outcome with Dr.Eid and his team has been excellent. I did many months of research and kept coming back to Dr Eid based on his long experience and pioneering the process of the No Touch Technique. He has a very warm and patient approach to explaining all that one goes through to have an implant put in. He also supplied me with much documentation and literature about the procedure and follow up. Plus his very low level of infection rate which no other Dr seemed to share openly. I also liked the fact I could call other patients who had the procedure to  get a good feeling as to what one could expect
The recovery period takes some time, and there is pain and discomfort but will lessen over time
Im just finishing my 2nd week of recovery, but have bern improving more and more each day
The other positive thing to know is Dr Eid’s accessibility to reach him when needed for a consult or visit His staff is also extremely helpful and encouraging

originalText.text: Dr. Eid, in my opinion is the best in his field! From the first time I walked into his office I felt welcomed and at ease. His staff is truly professional and kind making one feel they are in good hands. Dr. Eid’s exceptional expertise and professionalism in his field is extraordinary. I felt confident and assured of a positive outcome from day one. Dr. Eid and his staff have given me the confidence and ability to perform in a way I haven’t experienced in many years. My wife and I highly recommend Dr. Eid for this life enhancing procedure!

originalText.text: Dr. Eid went above and beyond what I expected on my first visit. He was extremely knowledgeable, sensitive and informative… I immediately felt at ease – and felt confident that I was going to receive expert medical care. I was very impressed with the overall experience highly recommend him.

text.text: Dr. Eid went above and beyond what I expected on my first visit. He was extremely knowledgeable, sensitive and informative… I immediately felt at ease – and felt confident that I was going to receive expert medical care. I was very impressed with the overall experience highly recommend him.

originalText.text: The web site they have is so informative and information rich, it helped me make my decision to have this procedure done with Dr. Eid and his staff. After countless emails with questions, the staff was very courteous and professional in answering all my questions, putting my mind at ease. Finally, when it came to move forward, my phone video consultation with Dr.Eid, was very excellent and I felt confident about the procedure, putting my mind at ease. When I visited the office for my pre-op protocol with Dr. Eid, I had no doubt that I was in good hands and have the right doctor and group to have this done. I felt like I knew the staff and Dr. Eid when I arrived at the office. When I left the office, all my doubt was erased from my mind and I'll be looking forward to a renewed sexual health in my life. I highly recommend this group, and so far it has been a very positive and awesome experience.
